hero.subtitle: 3rd Year Student · Hospitality Management
hero.institution: Samarkand Institute of Economics and Service
hero.tagline: Researching hospitality innovation, digitalization & AI in hotels. Bridging academia and industry—Schedy Founder · Wellfort Hotel · Kadextar.

about.label: Profile
about.para1: I am a third-year Hospitality Management student at the Samarkand Institute of Economics and Service, with 8+ research publications and operational experience from a reception-administrator internship at Wellfort Hotel. My work focuses on how digitalization, AI, and sustainable practice drive economic efficiency and competitive advantage in the sector.
about.para2: As founder of Schedy and creator of the Kadextar channel, I combine research, operations, and content leadership with an international outlook. I am working toward IELTS Band 8 and am committed to connecting Central Asian hospitality with global standards and future-ready operations.
about.focus1: Digitalization and technology in hospitality operations
about.focus2: AI applications in hotels and guest experience
about.focus4: Economic efficiency and investment in the sector
about.focus5: Bridging academia, industry, and international standards

strategicVision.vision4: Contributing to sustainable tourism development in Central Asia

research.label: Research & Publications
research.title: Scholarly Contributions
research.subtitle: Academic papers on hospitality, economic policy, and digitalization
research.pub1Title: Improving the Efficiency of State Regulation in the Conditions of Economic Transformation of Uzbekistan
research.pub1Abstract: This paper examines the role and efficiency of state regulation in the context of ongoing economic transformation in Uzbekistan. It analyses institutional frameworks, regulatory instruments, and their impact on economic development and proposes recommendations for enhancing regulatory effectiveness.
research.pub2Title: Analysis of the Factors Influencing the Development of Domestic Tourism in the Republic of Karakalpakstan
research.pub2Abstract: A study of the determinants and barriers affecting the development of domestic tourism in the Republic of Karakalpakstan. The research identifies key factors—infrastructure, policy, and regional specificities—and discusses strategies for sustainable growth of the local tourism sector.
research.pub3Title: Innovative Approaches in Foreign Language Learning: National and International Experience
research.pub3Abstract: A comparative review of innovative methodologies in foreign language education, drawing on national and international practice. The paper explores technology-enhanced learning, communicative approaches, and their applicability in hospitality and tertiary education contexts.
research.pub4Title: The Possibilities of Applying Artificial Intelligence in International Hotels
research.pub4Abstract: An analysis of current and potential applications of artificial intelligence in international hotel operations, including guest services, revenue management, and operational efficiency. The study discusses implementation challenges and strategic implications for the hospitality industry.
research.pub5Title: The Impact of Digitalization on the Development and Management of Special Accommodation Facilities
research.pub5Abstract: This paper investigates how digitalization influences the development, management, and competitiveness of special accommodation facilities. It addresses digital tools, booking systems, and management practices in niche accommodation segments.
research.pub6Title: Innovative Approaches to Sustainable Development of the Hotel Business in Uzbekistan
research.pub6Abstract: A study on innovative strategies for achieving sustainable development in the hotel sector in Uzbekistan. The research covers environmental, social, and economic dimensions and outlines practical approaches for hoteliers and policymakers.
research.pub7Title: Ways of Attracting Investments in the Hotel Business and Improving Economic Efficiency
research.pub7Abstract: An examination of mechanisms and strategies for attracting investment into the hotel industry and improving economic efficiency. The paper discusses financing instruments, investment climate, and best practices for hospitality development.
research.pub8Title: Economic Reforms in Uzbekistan: Comparative Analysis with Other Central Asian Countries
research.pub8Abstract: A comparative analysis of economic reforms in Uzbekistan alongside other Central Asian countries. The study evaluates reform trajectories, institutional changes, and outcomes, providing a regional perspective on economic transformation.

experience.label: Hospitality Experience
experience.title: Industry & Academic Journey
experience.subtitle: From hands-on operations to research-driven insights
experience.desc1: Supporting faculty research on guest experience metrics and sustainable operations. Conducting literature reviews and data analysis.
experience.desc2: Handled VIP guest requests, coordinated with housekeeping and F&B. Contributed to service recovery protocols.
experience.desc3: Rotated through front office, concierge, and events. Gained hands-on experience in high-touch service delivery.
